inn1.comm: Kula's in business straightaway but he's very very very lucky to get that wicket because there is a thick inside edge, the ball comes in off the seam around the off stump and Kamran gets a lot of wood on that before the ball sails past his pads, Gamini Silva thinks about it, walks to the side and suddenly raises the finger
fullish in length outside off and pushed to the off side
comes in off the seam and he taps it to the on side
keeps it on a full length outside off and he squeezes it out to mid-off
fishes at it outside the off stump, the ball leaves the right hander
starts off by firing it on the blockhole and Nazir does well to angle his bat and maneuver it between point and cover
angles it on middle and leg and he works it past mid-on
gets behind the line and pushes it away firmly towards the covers
shot! Lands on the half volley outside off and he gets his bat nicely behind the ball before pushing it elegantly past the covers

almost perfectly bisects the gap between the keeper and first slip, Prasad drops it a fraction shorter outside off, Nazir tries to punch it through the off side and the thick edge flies past Sanga who falls to his right, Jayawardene was a little too wide at slip and he hardly moved

even better! This one just rocketed off the bat, it was a half volley outside off asking to be hit and both the mid-off and cover fielders could barely react as the ball sped away, driven firmly off the front foot
gets forward to a full away swinger and bisects the gap between cover and point
keeps it on the stumps and he defends it back to the bowler
plays a touch away from the body and mistimes the drive back to the bowler
angles it on middle and leg and he clips it wide of square leg
gets a good stride forward and drives to the covers, tells his partner to stay put
fullish in length outside off and pushed just wide of mid-off for a single
angles it on middle and leg and he gets an inside edge to the on side
enjoys a wild swish outside the off stump and the ball creeps under his bat
he plays a checked drive past the bowler who dives to his right and there's a scramble between Jayasuriya and Mendis close to the straight boundary
gets across his stumps and taps it to the off side
bangs it on a good length and forces him to fend it to the on side
angles it on middle and leg and he works it just wide of mid-on
the ball's really racing off the bat, just a defensive push and it's enough to bisect the gap near cover
gets a half stride forward and defends with a dead bat
lands outside off and he gets forward and steers it with soft hands to point
nice solid defense on the front foot by Nazir
really good effort by Kapugedera at backward point, flings himself to his left and saves it one-handed, Nazir tries to angle it away for a single
fullish in length outside off and driven to mid-off
hits the deck hard and the bouncer clears the batsman comfortably
tries to mow it away to the on side but it was nothing more than a wild slog, the ball clips his pads and Prasad appeals very confidently but that wasn't hitting anything
Fires it on the blockhole outside off and dug out to the off side
Another fast inswinging yorker and nazir watches it all the way through, squeezes it out to the off side
poor delivery, half volley outside off and sits up nicely for Nazir, he gets underneath the bounce and scoops it over cover
he made that look so easy, drops it a fraction short on middle and leg and he swivels and a short-arm jab is enough to clear square leg
full outside off and jammed hard towards cover but the fielder at short cover gets a hand to it

poor effort by Mendis, Nazir angles it away deliberately past the keeper because there was no slip in place, Mendis has it covered at third man but he's a little lazy in bending down to stop it near the rope
full outside off and driven to mid-off
takes a steps down the pitch and tries to flat bat it to the on side but he mistimes the shot to mid-on
gets right behind the line and defends
gets across, covers the line and defends again
change of pace and it allows him time to angle it away down to third man
fullish in length on the off stump and driven back to the bowler
gets across and defends to the off side
shuffles and clips it to the on side for a single
no turn whatsoever, gets forward and defends

no real doubts about this one, the ball holds its line after pitching and appears to head straight towards the middle stump, Nazir fails to gets his bat behind the line as he tries to clip it across the line and the ball hits him flush on the front pad, easy one for Steve Davis
fullish in length outside off, driven down to mid-off
fullish in length outside off and driven to cover

close call! Comes back in off the seam and Younis is trapped at the crease as he tries to work it to the on side, he's hit above the knee roll almost adjacent to the leg stump, that looked very close and Gamini Silva hesitates
stays behind the line and defends
angles it on middle and leg stump and worked towards midwicket
eased away past the big gap between mid-on and midwicket, he turns his wrists and works it with the movement, the quick outfield does the rest
big appeal! He gets a good stride forward and shapes to sweep but the ball clips him above the knee roll, Steve Davis reckoned the height saved him
pushed away to the on side
shapes to cut past point but the ball skids through and beats the edge
stays behind the line and punches it past the bowler towards mid-off
full on middle and leg and worked to mid-on
stays right behind the line and defends
gets beside the line and steers it down to backward point
close to cut but he manages to slice it away wide of backward point
doesn't bounce as much but he gets behind the line and steers it to the off side
fullish in length on the off stump and pushed firmly through the line straight  to mid-off
slight change of pace and the batsman tries to squeeze it past point
gets behind the line and defends down the pitch
gets across and defends to the off side
tries to force it past the bowler on the walk but Mendis somehow manages to intercept it
worked away to the on side
flighted on middle and leg, he gets slightly forward and clips him high over midwicket, the fielder in the deep had no chance
defends solidly
punches it towards wide long-off for a couple
full outside off and driven past the covers
stays beside the line and pushes it straight to point
gets forward and beside the line of the ball and caresses it past backward point with ease, Kulasekara sprints across from deep cover and cuts it off before the rope
confusion in the calling, he pushes it in front of mid-off and really challenges the fielder, Yousuf turns around at the half way point and scampers back, the throw is wide
clips it to the on side for a single
there's a big gap between third man and backward point and Yousuf steers it there
gets across and pats it to the off side
turns the bat and knocks it to midwicket
gets forward and pushes it to the covers
shows the full face of the bat and defends
pushes it behind square on the off side
pushed to the covers and Younis refuses the single on seeing Kapugedera get across quickly
fishing outside the off stump, loss of concentration and Yousuf nearly edges it
gets forward and pushes him down to the covers
keeps a bit low but he gets behind the line and defends back to the bowler
lands it on a good length outside off, defended to the off side
grants him width outside off and he slices it away to Kulasekara at sweeper cover
his the deck hard and he gets his elbows high and nudges it easily down to third man
strikes him on the pads down the leg side as he tries to flick it away, half hearted appeal
sashays down the pitch to disturb the bowler's rhythm, he clips it over midwicket and a good effort by Kula saves a couple of runs
gets a bit of width and he steers it to third man
drifts on the pads and he clips it with the angle to fine leg
stays beside the line and easily angles it down to third man
stands tall and chops it down to point
stays beside the line and taps him firmly down to deep cover
hits the deck hard and the ball really hurries onto Yousuf but he manages to pull easily to deep square leg
slower delivery and much fuller, on the pads and easily worked away down to mid-on
stays beside the line and angles it to third man, huge gap there
full marks for placement, half vollery outside off and he leans forward and pushes it very firmly past the gap between mid-off and cover, Kula did his best at sweeper cover but he had no chance
pushed to cover and well intercepted by Jayawardene, he has a shy at the stumps
driven firmly and well stopped by the bowler
lunges forward and driven on the up down to sweeper cover
drifts on the pads and he clips him down to fine leg
chips down the track and just checks his shot  on seeing the length, he decides to scoop him squarer on the off side and down to third man
stays back and drops the ball to the on side
shuffles and clips him down to midwicket
stays back and tries to whip it to the on side but the ball clips his pads and rolls away, hits him well outside leg and Bandara appeals anyway
flighted on middle and leg and clipped gently to short fine leg
Chance for a return catch! Thick leading edge just falls short of the bowler who makes a good attempt diving forward
Stays back and he really slaps this one past deep extra cover, powerfully hit
pushed straight to short fine leg
driven to mid-off
gets well forward and pushes it to point
gets well forward and pushes it to cover
goes for the cut and misses, cramped for room
this time he makes good contact with the cut and the placement is good, he just manages to angle it wide of Mathews at short third man, that's the 50 stand
flighted on middle and leg and clipped past midwicket, puts pressure on the fielder there
defended to the on side
flighted on middle and off, driven square of the wicket on the off side
clipped away down to square leg
pushes it towards point and decides against the single
gets forward and pushes it through the line to long-off
gets forward and defends to the off side
stays back and cuts it down to sweeper cover
appeal! The top spinner catches him on the base of the bat but he gets a very good stride forward, maybe that saved him, davis shakes his head
pushed to the off side
worked away behind square on the on side
hurries onto him and he tries to work it past midwicket
drops it a fraction short and the length is just right for Yousuf to swivel, gets on top of the bounce and pull past midwicket, beats two fielders in the deep
Younis is carrying on from where he left off, gets forward to a half volley and cracks it wide of deep extra cover
worked towards midwicket and Jayasuriya enthusiastically sprints and does the fielding himself
just when he was eyeing his fifty! The ball lands outside off and there's width for Yousuf to cut it away, only he doesn't execute it properly, Sangakkara snaps the edge
gets forward and steers him to the off side
gets forward and nudges it to midwicket
full outside off and pushed down the ground to long-off
gets on his knee and sweeps him down to fine leg
gets well forward and smothers the spin
quicker through the air and defends forward
turns it to the on side and Jayasuriya sprints all the way from short fine leg to cut it off
softly turned away past midwicket, wide open spaces there
flighted on middle and leg, he clips it to deep midwicket
slow through the air and nudged away to the on side again
gives it a lot more air and he defends to mid-off
he's again content getting forward to defend
stays back and softly nudges it towards midwicket
gets forward and nudges it softly down to square leg
gives it a lot of air, he gets forward and pushes it down the pitch
the leading edge pops up and falls a few inches short of the bowler, he was onto the shot too early
shot! Flighted on middle and leg and Younis gets in position early to slog him, gets on his knee and nearly clears the deep midwicket rope
flights it down the leg side again and he sweeps him down to fine leg
gets behind the line and defends
pushed in flatter and quicker, he rocks back and slaps him down to sweeper cover and they should have pushed for a second run after Kula fumbled
gets well forward and defends
rocks back and forces him to sweeper cover, Kula again, he's been busy today
flighted on middle and leg and patted away
full outside off and pushed back to the bowler
lunges forward and pushes him to mid-off
changes direction and plays the reverse paddle, mendis made the mistake of feeding him outside the off stump, more power on that would have taken it for four
reaches out and drives to sweeper cover
full outside off and worked away down to sweeper cover
stays back and punches him down to wide long-on, that's his fifty!
gets well forward and taps it to mid-on
pushed in flatter, he stays back and punches it to long-off
stays back and punches him to sweeper cover
plays the reverse paddle again and he manages to beat the fielder again, Mendis does well to sprint and cut it off
stays back and clips him across the line
gets well forward and drives to mid-off
gets forward and pushes it through the line to long-on
fullish outside off and driven down to mid-off
drifts on the pads and he works it down to fine leg
gets on the front foot and defends
pushed through flatter and quicker, pushed down to cover
drives very late and he takes advantage of the fact that there's no slip, the thin edge beats the keeper and short third man
pushes it straight to cover
full on middle and leg and whipped away stylishly on one leg past the big gap at deep midwicket
comes over the wicket, he tries to whip it away but fails to beat the bowler
lunges forward and turns it towards square leg
gets forward and turns it to deep backward square-leg for a single
turns it straight to short fine leg
skids through and keeps a but low, knocks it back to the bowler
pushes it back to the bowler again
squirts it towards point and sets off for a quick single
another reverse paddle but he places it straight to short third man
stays back and punches it to long-off
flighted on middle stump, his eyes open wide, he gets on his knee and slog sweeps him over midwicket and bisects the gap to perfection
gets forward and defends with a dead bat
gets forward and sweeps him straight to deep square leg
slow through the air, he decides to get on his knee this time and slog sweeps, over midwicket
gets forward and pushes it to the off side
picks it from outside off and turns it to square leg
fullish on the pads and clipped to midwicket
just closes the face of the bat and clips it just wide of short fine leg
comes over the wicket, makes room and checks his shot
flighted on middle and leg, he clips it powerfully to deep midwicket
checks his shot and pushes it down the pitch
drops it short, he swivels and pulls past midwicket, the placement was good and the fielder gave up the chase
full and straight, driven down to mid-on for a single
back of a length, on the pads, and turned away to fine leg
short of a length, played with an open face, can't beat point

not given, big shout, back of a length, moving away, Sanga and Prasad go up right away, Gamini Silva doesn't give it, Sanga can't believe it, has some advice for Younis, has a long chat with him, although Younis laughs through it, it is not so friendly a chat
full, moving in, hit down the ground for one
outside off, looks to drive, but gets it straight to cover
keeps a bit low and he clips it to midwicket
punches it in front of mid-off and sets off for a quick single and the throw is wide at the bowler's end
slower ball and he picks it late, gets an inside edge which rolls to fine leg
full on the pads and flicked away down to deep square leg, two fielders converge
full on middle and leg and he pushes it down the ground to long-on
lands it outside off and he chops it to backward point
chops it down to cover

taps it softly towards point and pinches a sharp single, Kapugedetra charges, picks it up on the dive and in one motion flicks it directly at the stumps, excellent effort but Misbah's hpome, the third umpire takes a look
shuffles and clips it down to fine leg
that's an excellent yorker, swinging in late and Younis tries to squirt it out but the ball catches the underedge and clips the top of the off stump
punches a full swinging delivery down the pitch, the fielders in the circle are alert and they don't push the single
plays a short arm pull but he mistimes it to the on side
tries to cut but he chops it down to backward point
stays back and chops it down to cover
he oversteps, change of pace and he slices it down to third man
Free Hit well not quite the desired result for Umar, it's a low full toss and he makes room but ends up mowing him to long-on off the toe of the bat
stays beside the line and chops him down to backward point
makes room to a pitched up delivery and ends up scooping it towards square third man, wide of Jayasuriya so he's safe
ambitious appeal, I think it was a thick inside edge, Mathews gets excited
gets it to kick up off a good length, the batsman tries to cheekily dab it to third man and nearly spoons it to the keeper
low full toss and he spoons it just wide of the fielder at short cover who makes a good attempt
stays back and punches it back to the bowler
full outside off and punched away down to Jayasuriya at sweeper cover
bangs it in short and he checks the pull shot on seeing the extra bounce, manages to keep it down
full outside off and driven square to sweeper cover
punched hard off the front foot and Jayawardene does well to fall to his right and cut it off

Umar gets on his knee to a full and wide delivery and tries to take him downtown, he nearly succeeds though but there wasn't elevation to clear long-off, Tharanga cups it just inches before the rope and Mathews gives Umar a send-off
steers it to the off side
that's a gift, poor cricket by Jayawardene, Afridi taps it to short cover and sets off, turns back but Jayawardene has a shy at the stumps with no fielder backing up, four overthrows
full on the off stump and pushed to cover
stays beside the line and taps him to cover

no doubt about this edge! Kulasekara pitches it up and invites the drive and Afridi obliges, he pushes at it away from the body and gets a thick outside edge, Sanga doesn't bother to appeal, it was very obvious
safely pats away his first delivery right back to the bowler
full and swinging away, pushed towards cover
chips it in the air and the ball just falls short of short midwicket
bangs it in short and he swivels and pulls but finds fine leg
testing bouncer, the slower one which loops up and catches the batsman in 2 minds, Rana sways back and evades it well
lands it on middle and leg and he pushes it back to the bowler
stays beside the line and chops it down to backward point
mistimes the cut and chops it down to Kapugedera at backward point again
he struggles to push it past the offside field, yet another dot ball
another slice straight to Kapugedera, do they have a deal or something?
and finally Misbah manages to beat the infield on the off side, change of pace and he deftly angles it down to third man
very slow through the air outside the off stump, he reaches out and drives to sweeper cover
spins away and Rana had no clue what to do, luckily it was wide of the off stump
reaches out and taps it to cover
pushes it towards cover and sets off quickly
full outside off and driven down to long-off
fullish on middle and leg and pushed to long-on
the slow off cutter and Rana just hangs his bat out and steers him to third man
pushes it to the covers and challenges the fielder who has a shy at the stumps  at the bowler's end
gets across his stumps and gets an inside edge to the on side
cuts back in off the seam and he nearly chops it onto his pads, the bowler's excited
stays beside the line and steers him to third man
pushes it with soft hands towards mid-on and scampers through, the fielder dives and takes aim in one motion but misses the stumps
slides down the leg side and he fails to make contact with that sweep
shapes to cut but ends up chopping it down to cover
full outside off and driven to long-off
makes room to club away a full toss but he places it straight to long-on
defends very close to the pads, it was pad first but perhaps outside the line of off, Gamini Silva the umpire there
makes room and drives firmly down to sweeper cover, Kula as usual
makes room and pushes a low full toss to long-off
fires it on the blockhole and he digs it out to mid-on
forget about trying to catch that, he makes room to a good length delivery and clubs him over cow corner
fail to put away a friendly full toss, makes room and swishes a thin air, Sanga almost loses control of the ball
bashes it down the pitch but Kula misfields
gets away with another full, connects off the bottom of the bat and rolls to extra cover
makes room and chops it straight to cover, not the best placement
fetches it from wide outside off and paddles it straight to short fine leg
low full toss and pushed through the line to long-on
exposes all three stumps and checks his shot, nudges it to point
fired in on leg stump and pushed to long-on
well bowled, on the blockhole and squeezed to long-on
cramped for room to cut, he chops it down to point
full outside off and squirted down to third man
that's a beamer...just... Rana swings and the ball just sails over his waist, Sanga fumbles
on the blockhole outside off, chopped down to point
straight as straight can get, he makes room to a delivery aimed at the base of the stumps, gets underneath the bounce and tees off, over the sight screen and maximum
fires it just outside off and Rana makes room but fails to squirt it out
full toss at waist height and he tucks it to midwicket and challenges the fielder
chips down the track, checks his shot and taps it to cover
makes too much room ,Mendis follows him and fires the ball on his shoes, well bowled
makes room and mows him to the on side
comes down the track, manages to get underneath the bounce and scoops a full delivery over mid-off
fires it down the leg side as he follows the batsman
backs away and pushes it through the line to long-on
excellent effort by Mahela, the batsman forces it hard down to long-on and Mahela sprints from his position, dives and pulls it back just inches before the rope
that was all power, makes room and takes a few paces down the pitch, he digs it out hard past the bowler and none of the fielders close to the straight boundary were visible
attempts a cheeky paddle and the ball pitches just outside the line of the off stump and clips his boot, that would have hit I guess
makes room and tries to take him downtown, he flat bats it and doesn't get enough elevation to clear long-off, easy for Tharanga
makes room to club it to the on side but he mistimes it and the ball rolls to the off side instead
too full at this stage, he makes room and bashes it down the ground, no chance for long-on

backs away and pounds it towards Tharanga at long-on, he pushes the second run but the batsmen are up against it, the throw is flat and quick and Kula whips off the bails, Anjum is short of his ground and the third umpire confirms

inn2.comm: high on the bat straightaway, kicks up off a good length and Tharanga drops it down with soft hands
that's a jaffa outside the off stump, just sneaks past the edge after Tharanga shuffles across

first blood to Aamer and Pakistan get rid of the top scorer from the previous game, Aamer lands it on a good length outside off and gets it to come in with the angle, the ball gets high on Tharanga who pokes his bat out and gives Umar Akmal catching practice at second slip
streaky way to get off the mark, reaches out to drive and he pushes it on the up just wide of second slip
lands outside off and he shoulders arms
just shapes it across the right hander and catches Jayawardene in a moment of uncertainty, just sneaks past the edge
keeps it just outside the off stump, he moves back and chops it to the off side
comes back in with the angle, bounces a bit more and catches him high on the pad, the bowler appeals
full outside off and he pushes it down to mid-off to get off the mark
Slightly harsh call, gets it to move away from the right hander and he shoulders arms, Davis penalizes him
moves away from him and he gets behind the line and defends
shuffles across and defends again, this is a good line
tempts him to drive by pitching it up and swinging it away, close call for the batsman as he nearly edges it
big appeal but I'm not so sure if it was that close, Jayasuriya takes his eyes off a short ball and the ball hits his arm and lobs to first slip
fizzes past the batsman, he works up some good bounce, well left by Jayasuriya
angles it across him and he gets across and clips him to fine leg
unplayable bouncer, wide called but the bowler shouldn't be too disappointed with that because it really tested Jayawardene
gets across and pushes it to the off side
short down the leg side and Jayawardene nearly gloves it to the keeper as he shapes to pull, Aamer's bowling it at good pace
he errs by overpitching outside off, the width is enough for Jayawardene to lean onto the drive and crash it past cover
the extra delivery has cost Pakistan a boundary, he drops it short this time but the bounce is good enough for Jayawardene to swivel and club it past square leg
hits the deck hard and angles it on the off stump, he hops and clips it to the on side
stays back at the crease and pats it firmly to mid-off
that's not the line or the length to bowl, friendly half volley outside off, he reaches out and scoops it high over extra cover

nice comeback by Rana and I don't think Jayasuriya will ever want to see a replay of that, the slower ball completely foxes him, he tries to work it to the on side but gets a tame leading edge which pops up to Misbah at second slip, one of the easiest catches you'll see and Naved in chuffed
stays behind the line and defends to the bowler

seemed a little risky at first but he actually managed to pierce that pretty well, the ball gets really high on him outside off, he swats it away in the air outside off but finds the gap between backward point and cover
gets across and pats it to the off side
gives him width and he stylishly cuts it away to square third man
cuts back in sharply off the seam and he manages to defend it
angles it towards the pads, he closes the face of the bat and finds the gap at midwicket
slower off the pitch, he gets beside the line and steers it towards the slips
angles it into the left-hander, he pushes it firmly to mid-off
shuffles across and works it with the angle to the on side, Aamer mops up at fine leg
the sharp indipper catches him by surprise and he just manages to fend it off, all three stumps were exposed
works it past the gap between mid-on and midwicket for a couple
super delivery, angles it across him and makes him play at it, the ball just fizzes past the edge
shuffles and clips it to the on side
all the way...just... banged in short and Jayawardene goes for the hook, he gets enough wood on it to take it over the rope at fine leg, almost straight over the keeper's head
close! Slashes outside the off stump and it just drops short of Nazir at backward point
works it in front of mid-on and gets off the blocks very quickly
hits a good length outside off and he pushes it towards point
gets beside the line and taps it towards cover
angles it across the right hander and he hops and cuts to third man
doesn't time the punch very well, the ball beats short cover and he tells his partner to stay back
stays behind the line and punches it to mid-off
on the pads and helped on its way to fine leg
tries to punch it past the covers but he ends up chopping it to the fielders
he oversteps, Sanga chops it, to the off side, free hit coming up
Free Hit the change of pace doesn't work as he drops it short and gives Sanga enough time to swivel and pound it over midwicket
stays back and punches it straight to short cover
gets beside the line and punches it firmly to the covers
good length delivery, he drives to cover
stays back and punches it on the walk to mid-off
nice sharp bouncer, forces Sangakkara to sway away
drops it short again but this time Sanga swivels and upper cuts it to third man
poor delivery down the leg side, Jayawardene probably knew the fielder at fine leg, Rana Naved, was a little square so he swivels and pulls it fine
slices it down to backward point, Nazir gets a bad bounce
punches it firmly to the covers
angles it on the pads and he only turns his wrists slightly before clipping it away past the gap between mid-on and midwicket, awesome timing

another tame dismissal! Rana Naved's slower deliveries are foxing the best of the best in this line-up, Sangakkara tries to work it to the on side on the walk but the leading edge balloons to Afridi at extra cover
keeps it on the stumps and he gets behind the line and defends back to the bowler
turns it towards short midwicket
gets beside the line and pushes it down to Nazir at backward point
turns it away to midwicket with soft hands and thinks of a second run, but they decide against it
gets across to a full delivery and drives straight to short cover
angles it on the pads and he clips it away to fine leg
stays back and punches it with a straight bat to short cover
short of a length and he gets his elbows high and defends to the off side
keeps it on a good length on the stumps, no room for the batsman, he clips it to the on side
shuffles and works it to square leg
really changes the pace on that one, Kapugedera lazily wafts at it without moving his feet
stays behind the line and punches it to the off side
stays beside the line and taps it to point
angles it across the right-hander and he tries to steer it away past the infield but he can't beat backward point
gets beside the line and pushes it to the off side

a poor shot really costs Jayawardene, Aamer angles it wide across the right-hander and Jayawardene stays at the crease and swishes at it, gets a thin edge to the keeper, not the best delivery really so it was Jayawardene who brought it on himself
gets behind the line and defends
reaches out and chops it down to backward point

five down and counting, Aamer pitches it up wide outside off and angles it really wide across the right-hander, Kapugedera goes for a wild cover drive and gets a thick outside edge to Misbah at first slip, he falls to his left and takes it easily
full and wide outside off and he pushes it straight to mid-off
lovely shot, full and wide outside off, gets behind the line and pushes it with little effort past the gap between mid-off and cover
Reaches out to a wide delivery and steers it to third man
poor fielding by Aamer, drifts on the pads and he shuffles and clips it fine, Aamer had it covered but was very lazing in bending down to intercept it
gets across his stumps and taps it to the off side
gets beside the line and edges it past the slips and down to third man
angles it across the right-hander and he gets across and shoulders arms
teases him again with that angle, he tries to punch it away but the ball beats him
he safely shoulders arms this time
angles it on middle and off, he shuffles and clips it to midwicket
gets across his stumps and pushes it with soft hands to mid-on

Aamer takes four! Another poor shot, Aamer bowls it slightly short of a length on middle and off and gets it to move away from the right-hander, Mathews cannot resist a slash and Kamran snaps a thick edge
keeps a little low, he gets behind the line and defends back to the bowler
gets behind the line and defends again
full and wide outside off, he gets forward and drives to point
gets forward and drives to the off side

the Sri Lankans have a plane to catch in roughly 15 minutes, that explains the procession of wickets, Rana Naved pitches it up outside off and gets it to move away, Kulasekara follows it to drive, doesn't move his feet and gets an edge, Misbah takes a very neat low catch at slip
nearly edges this one to the keeper, close call
gets beside the line and steers it to the off side
angles it into the left-hander and Kandamby safely taps it away
fullish in length outside off, he gets beside the line and steers it past the gap between point and cover
angles it wide outside the off, he lets it go to the keeper
gets beside the line and steers it to the off side
aims for the yorker but it's a low full toss, he clips it to midwicket
drifts on the pads and he clips it to fine leg
he gets some dangerous reverse swing there, Prasad does well to dig it out to the covers
a bit of width outside off, he reaches out and drives to third man
'castled and lagered'.... Rana Naved gets the ball to nip back in and catches Prasad at the crease, he gets a thick inside edge and the ball crashes onto middle and leg
appeal for a leg before! Swings it in and traps him on the pads, he plays all around it, perhaps missing leg, Gamini Silva is tested there
gets forward and drives towards point
drifts on the pads and he clips it to fine leg
stays right behind the line and defends back to the bowler
stays beside the line and pushes it to backward point
angles it on middle and leg and he softly pushes it to the off side
gets forward and manages to drive past the gap at point for a couple
swings it in and bowls it on the blockhole,he does well to dig it out to the on side
fullish in length outside off and he mistimes the drive to cover
stylish punch off the front foot but he places it straight to extra cover
reaches out to a wide delivery and drives to third man
he oversteps, the slower ball this time and Bandara wanted to leave it at first but then decided to angle it to third man
Free Hit Another overstep, Kandamby clubs a low full toss down to wide long-on
Free Hit Better delivery by Rana Naved, on the blockhole outside leg and Kandamby backs away and fails to dig it out
fishes at it outside off, nearly spoons it to the keeper
full outside off, he gets beside the line and steers it wide of point
holds the length back and he pokes his bat at it and misses
pulls it wide of midwicket, not very well timed
angles it away from him and he defends to the off side
lands it on the off stump and he defends solidly
lands outside off, he gets across and clips it to the on side
shapes to cut but he cannot beat backward point
flighted outside off, he gets on his knee and tries to sweep but places it to midwicket
down the leg side and it missed everything, including leg slip
gets back and across and cuts to point
flighted on middle and leg and defended with soft hands
gets forward and defends with a dead bat
pitches it up outside off and he nearly spoons it on the full to Nazir at backward point, the ball dips before reaching him
full and swinging in on middle and leg and he tries to force it down the ground but finds mid-on
digs out a fast inswinging yorker to the off side, there's a direct hit at the batsman's end but he's home, the third umpire takes a look
gets on the front foot and pushes it towards cover, slight misfield there
holds the length back a bit and he tries to clear mid-off, didn;t quite time it well but good enough to beat the fielder
forces it off the front foot to mid-off and scampers the single, the throw was wide at the batsman's end
tucks it to the on side
tries to sweep him past midwicket but hardly any power on that
gets a long way across and exposes all three stumps, he sweeps to square leg
makes room to cut but chops it down to point
chips down the track but he's beaten, the ball clips his pads and rolls away
flighted on middle and leg, gets forward and defends
teases him with a slower ball outside off and Bandara carefully watches it all the way through
gives him just a hint of width outside off and he angles it away to third man
full outside the off stump and he reaches out and edges it down to third man
he gets an inside edge off a wild swing and the ball trickles past his stumps and runs to fine leg, Rana boots it away
lands it on the blockhole and Bandara easily digs it out to mid-off
slower ball outside off and he reaches out and steers it wide of backward point
gets forward and defends with a dead bat
the doosra beats him completely, goes on the backfoot
stays back and softly punches it to cover
full outside off and pushed to the off side
a little too full and wide outside off, he reaches out and drives to deep cover and Umar Akmal does well to dive and cut it off
that's a low full toss outside off, he gets forward and pushes it to cover
full outside off and he gives it a loud thump, Afridi picks it up at sweeper cover
fullish in length outside off, he gets behind the line and defends to the off side
comes round the wicket, he gets right behind the line and pushes it to mid-off
full outside off and pushed down to sweeper cover
gets forward and steers it to backward point
gets forward and defends with a dead bat
Dropped Chips down the track and he skies it down to deep midwicket, Afridi fluffs the catch, may have lost it in the lights
gets a long way across his stumps and sweeps but the ball clips the pads and beats leg slip
defends very close to the pads and there's a stifled appeal for an lbw
defends with a dead bat
gets forward and smothers the spin
poor start for Afridi, drops it short and it's too easy for Kandamby as he rocks back and clubs it over midwicket
gets forward and defends back to the bowler
shuffles and works it to the on side, that's the fifty stand
traps him low on the pads but with a big stride forward, Kamran appeals but Afridi's not interested
clips it to the on side
skids through straight and Bandara shapes to cut, almost an edge
on off, turning in,  defended
cut to point
turned away to deep square leg
fuller and driven to cover
outside off, faster, played and missed
played square
outside off, lifted a little after pitching and missed by keeper
flighted, played to long-off
driven to mid-off
pitched on leg, Bandara gets an inside edge
outside off, sweeps to leg
on middle, plays a defensive shot
on off and middle, Bandara jumps out and lifts it over long-on. The ball was pitched shorter of good length
outside off, the ball rises after hitting the pad, no catch
driven to extra cover, they run hard
pitched on middle, Kandamby steps forward but misses the line
down leg side and that was nearly a stumped chance there. Akmal takes off the bails just as Kandambu gets his toe behind the crease. They appealed and it was turned down
short, looked to pull but since it wasn't short enough he ended up playing to the bowler
chips down the track and pushes it past the bowler
flighted on middle and leg, he gets on his knee and slogs him over midwicket, places it wide of the fielder in the deep
gets on his knee and sweeps to the on side

was he bowled or stumped? Afridi fires it full and quick on seeing the batsman advance down the track, he misses it completely and the bails were off, the umpire Steve Davis checks with the third umpire if he was bowled or stumped, the ball missed the stumps at first, rebounded off Kamran's gloves and knocked the bails off
shuffles and works it to the on side
defends with a dead bat and the ball nearly rolls onto the stumps
drives hard down the pitch and Ajmao intercepts it with his boot
gets forward and pushes it to mid-off
pushes it to the off side for a single
beats him outside the off stump
gives him width outside off and he cuts to the off side
Misbah rounds off a good day at the slips with a sharp catch, Mendis reaches out to drive and gets a thick outside edge, travels quickly and Misbah takes it easily at first slip
